text: Sphingomonas kaistensis is a Gram-negative, non-motile and non-spore-forming bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil in Korea.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas kaistensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase kaistensis Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Sphingomonas kaistensis
